page.title: 07WRITTLE, A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: Sunday in my family means getting up early and going to church. the church service starts at 10:45am and finishes at 11:45am The service we go to is called a family service. All my family go to church, that is my mum,my dad,Christopher,my brother, Ruth,my sister,and me. Christopher and I belong to the church choir and we practise on Wednesdays for one and a half hours. At 10:45am there is a Sunday school for five to eleven year olds. There is a church club for fourth years called the Seventy Seven Set. Sometimes in the service there is a baptism and sometimes after the service there is coffee served in the Christian Centre. After church we go home and have our lunch.
